content.prompt: Which of the following types of sources would likely be most useful in evaluating the effectiveness of the 1950 marriage law in bringing about social change in China?

choices.label: A memoir by a communist party official who was involved in the passage of the law
A documentary about the lives of Chinese women produced by a Chinese government film studio
A private diary by a married woman describing her daily work and family-related responsibilities
A propaganda poster depicting the ideal communist family, featuring a working mother and father and a happy child

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
